lexUnit.name: squat.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: crouch or sit with the knees bent and the heels close to or touching the buttocks or thighs.

sentence.text: Next to it squatted a young girl about fifteen or sixteen years old .
The open space in the middle had been carefully brushed and in its centre squatted two men about five feet apart ; by their sides stood two cages , each containing a pair of birds .
Beneath the boards on which the men squatted the matter froze hard and solid .
Beggars and bank managers squat side by side in a battered , broken office block , in a barn in the field next door and beneath sheets of plastic and bits of wood knocked up into makeshift shelters .
We were squatting cross-legged on the floor of the mission house at Nyaung-ngu , half a dozen priests and a dozen men and women teachers .
It was Cheeks -- dead Cheeks -- squatting nude , snorting a line of zooper-blast from her pocket mirror , talking to someone in the bedroom .
Nicandra 's little Nettie stayed behind too , she scuffled around in the undergrowth alert for game of any sort -- a blackbird squatting low , or a rabbit with fear in its silly eyes .
He looked into his tent at the two dark cowled figures squatting there .
Benjamin stuck his tongue out at Peckle 's back , cleared a space on the floor and squatted there for at least half an hour sifting through the contents of the sack .
I was squatting there , contemplating my future , when suddenly the door burst open .
She squatted at the edge of the dug soil , experiencing pleasure in her own body 's supple movement and the warmth of the sun on her skin , and looked along the rows of plants .
A watchman squatted at the entrance of one , but he was asleep , and might as well have been a statue .
The Midnight Destroyer sits at your right elbow whilst the Lord Satan squats at your left .
The second helper should squat at the person 's knees and put one arm under the upper thighs and one under the calves of the legs .
Meg was squatting at the top of the stairs , her hands clutching the third and fourth struts tightly , her eyes wide , filled with fright .
I had fallen asleep , squatting behind a buttress of the church of St Nicholas long after curfew , my lips blue , my teeth chattering with the cold .
While his retainers squatted noiselessly behind him , the Tominah advanced to the edge of a rock overlooking the pool by about six feet , closed his eyes and opened his betel-nut-rouged mouth .
One helper ( the tallest ) should squat behind the person and raise their shoulders slightly .
` Charlie had managed to kindle a little fire of dry grass and was adding twigs one by one and I was squatting beside him .
Oliver was on the tow-path , squatting beside Mr Hellyer .
The taxi driver was squatting by one of Bonefish 's gateposts where he surreptitiously smoked a cigarette .
She made out the shape of Caro squatting in the armchair , rigidly still .
In a side street a vegetable seller , squatting in the shade of a wall , offered fresh produce .
We squat in silence .
The big cat climbed stiffly down off the desk and squatted on a box of cat-sand under a corner table , staring straight ahead with a sublime conviction that it was invisible .
Finally he broke away and went and squatted on his haunches by the stream .
It 's extremely hard to explain why you are squatting on his lawn with your pyjamas round your ankles .
She saw a young man squatting on a rucksack , eating a bar of chocolate and looking at the board .
Bernie was squatting on the other side of the trolley .
Athelstan left his desk and squatted in front of Rastani .
About two hundred warriors were squatting under some of these trees and more were hurrying to join them .
There were no roads direct from the station to where the world began , but the carriage drivers , squatting over their breakfasts , directed us to an abandoned railway line which cut across country .
Walking up from the main road we passed the camel drivers squatting round their early morning fires .
Thessy , squatting nearby as he waited for his father 's permission to join the conversation , looked up as a twin-engined plane howled low overhead .
Never bend when you can kneel or squat
He crossed to where she was squatting and hauled her to her feet .
